title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.7 - Exemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.7 - Exemption

State Regulations
A member of the faculty (including an adjunct member of the
faculty) at the State University of New York and the City University of New

York, including all their constituent units except community colleges of the

State University of New York and the independent institutions operating
statutory or contract colleges on behalf of the State, and a State officer or
employee serving in the title of research scientist, cancer research scientist, research physician, research psychiatrist or psychiatrist, is exempt from
sections
930.4
and
930.5
of this Part, provided the
service performed by such member of the faculty is within the subject matter of
his or her official academic discipline. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
930.7

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 24, effective
6/18/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
